故事: 小男孩汤姆在放学回家的路上发现了一些钱。他很高兴，并开始思考如何使用这笔钱。走着走着，他遇到了阿姨。阿姨对他说：“汤姆，如果你帮我摘苹果，我会给你一些钱。”于是汤姆决定留在阿姨家帮忙摘苹果。
问题: 汤姆帮阿姨摘完苹果后，他会怎么做？
选项A: A. 汤姆会去公园玩耍。
选项B: B. 汤姆会去商店买东西。
选项C: C. 汤姆会协助阿姨制作苹果派。
选项D: D. 汤姆会把钱捐献给慈善机构。
STORY: The little boy Tom finds some money on his way home from school. He is very happy and starts to think about how to use this money. As he walks, he meets an aunt. The aunt says to him, "Tom, if you help me pick apples, I give you some money." So Tom decides to stay at the aunt's house to help pick apples.
QUESTION: What does Tom do after he helps the aunt pick apples?
OPTION-A: Tom goes to the park to play.
OPTION-B: Tom goes to the store to buy things.
OPTION-C: Tom helps the aunt make apple pie.
OPTION-D: Tom donates the money to a charity.

故事: 小男孩马克在午餐时间总想吃汉堡。当他走向学校食堂买汉堡时，他的好朋友伦尼过来对他说：“马克，如果你帮我解答数学作业的几个问题，我会给你一个汉堡。”所以马克决定帮伦尼做数学作业。
问题: 马克帮伦尼完成数学作业后，他会做什么？
选项A: A. 马克会继续去食堂买汉堡
选项B: B. 马克会吃来自伦尼的汉堡
选项C: C. 马克会去图书馆读书
选项D: D. 马克会去操场玩耍
STORY: The little boy Mark always wants to eat a hamburger at lunchtime. When he walks to the school cafeteria to buy a hamburger, his good friend Lenny comes to him and says, "Mark, if you help me answer a few questions on my math homework, I give you a hamburger." So Mark decides to help Lenny with his math homework.
QUESTION: What does Mark do after he helps Lenny finish his math homework?
OPTION-A: Mark continues to go to the cafeteria to buy a hamburger
OPTION-B: Mark eats the hamburger from Lenny
OPTION-C: Mark goes to the library to read
OPTION-D: Mark goes to the playground to play

故事: 小女孩苏珊想吃她昨天做的香甜巧克力饼干，但她的朋友邀请她去游泳。苏珊决定把饼干放回冰箱，然后跟朋友一起去游泳。
问题: 苏珊和朋友游泳回家后，她会怎么做？
选项A: A. 苏珊去吃她的巧克力饼干。
选项B: B. 苏珊又去游泳。
选项C: C. 苏珊开始做新的巧克力饼干。
选项D: D. 苏珊去睡觉。
STORY: The little girl Susan wants to eat the sweet chocolate cookies she makes yesterday, but her friend invites her to swim. Susan decides to put the cookies back in the refrigerator, then goes swimming with her friend.
QUESTION: What does Susan do after she comes home from swimming with her friend?
OPTION-A: Susan eats her chocolate cookies.
OPTION-B: Susan goes swimming again.
OPTION-C: Susan starts making new chocolate cookies.
OPTION-D: Susan goes to sleep.

故事: 小女孩艾米平时很喜欢画画，她一直想要买一盒新的色彩笔。有一天，她在校园里捡到了一笔钱。她很兴奋，准备用这笔钱买色彩笔。然而，当她经过学校的动物救助社团时，社团主席告诉她，如果她捐一些钱，他们会给她一个可爱的小挂件。艾米决定将钱捐给动物救助社团。
问题: 艾米在将钱捐给动物救助社团后，她会怎么做？
选项A: A. 艾米将不再去购买色彩笔。
选项B: B. 艾米继续在校园里寻找丢失的钱。
选项C: C. 艾米走进商店，去选购色彩笔。
选项D: D. 艾米继续参加动物救助社团。
STORY: The little girl Amy likes to draw usually, she always wants to buy a new box of colored pencils. One day, she picks up some money on campus. She is very excited and prepares to use this money to buy colored pencils. However, when she passes by the school's animal rescue club, the club president tells her that if she donates some money, they give her a cute little pendant. Amy decides to donate the money to the animal rescue club.
QUESTION: What does Amy do after she donates the money to the animal rescue club?
OPTION-A: Amy no longer goes to buy colored pencils.
OPTION-B: Amy continues to look for lost money on campus.
OPTION-C: Amy walks into the store to choose colored pencils.
OPTION-D: Amy continues to participate in the animal rescue club.

故事: 小男孩乔治很喜欢吃巧克力。他收到了祖父母赠送的过生日的零花钱，计划去便利店购买一个大巧克力。当他走过公园时，他看到一个游乐设施，那里的工作人员告诉他：“如果你愿意用你的零花钱参加游戏，你可能会赢得一个超级玩具。”乔治决定尝试运气，使用他的零花钱参加了游戏。
问题: 乔治在玩完游戏后，他会怎么做？
选项A: A. 乔治不会去便利店购买巧克力。
选项B: B. 乔治会再次参与游乐设施的游戏。
选项C: C. 乔治会去便利店购买巧克力。
选项D: D. 乔治会回家，然后与家人分享他的超级玩具。
STORY: The little boy George really likes to eat chocolate. He receives birthday pocket money from his grandparents and plans to go to the convenience store to buy a big chocolate. As he walks through the park, he sees a playground facility, where the staff tells him: "If you are willing to use your pocket money to participate in the game, you may win a super toy." George decides to try his luck and uses his pocket money to participate in the game.
QUESTION: What does George do after he finishes the game?
OPTION-A: George does not go to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
OPTION-B: George participates in the playground game again.
OPTION-C: George goes to the convenience store to buy chocolate.
OPTION-D: George goes home and then shares his super toy with his family.

故事: 大学生李雷打算在暑假去欧洲自由行。他为此存了一些钱，并寻找攻略，准备买机票和预定酒店。然后他的朋友小汪告诉他一家公益组织要去非洲的一些穷困地区做志愿者服务，但需要自筹一部分资金。李雷很受感动，决定参与到这项活动中。
问题: 李雷参与志愿活动后，他会怎么做？
选项A: A. 李雷将不再计划去欧洲自由行。
选项B: B. 李雷将继续计划去欧洲自由行。
选项C: C. 李雷将同时去欧洲和非洲。
选项D: D. 李雷计划未来去公益组织就职。
STORY: College student Li Lei plans to go to Europe for a free trip during the summer vacation. He saves some money for this, and looks for travel guides, prepares to buy plane tickets and book hotels. Then his friend Xiao Wang tells him that a charity organization is going to some poor areas in Africa to do volunteer service, but needs to raise some funds. Li Lei is very moved and decides to participate in this activity.
QUESTION: After Li Lei participates in the volunteer activity, what does he do?
OPTION-A: Li Lei no longer plans to go to Europe for a free trip.
OPTION-B: Li Lei continues to plan to go to Europe for a free trip.
OPTION-C: Li Lei goes to Europe and Africa at the same time.
OPTION-D: Li Lei plans to work for the charity organization in the future.

故事: 弗雷德是个喜欢花园工作的老人。一天早上，他在家里的花园里发现了一只流浪小猫。强烈的同情心使他决定收养这只小猫。然而，当他刚给小猫准备完食物时，他发现自己的花草即将枯死。他的邻居恰好走过来，请求他说："如果你去便利店给我买些东西，我可以帮你照料这些植物。”弗雷德决定到便利店去。
问题: 弗雷德完成邻居的请求后，他会怎么做？
选项A: A. 弗雷德会把食物喂给小猫。
选项B: B. 弗雷德将继续自己照料花草。
选项C: C. 弗雷德会去寻找更多的流浪猫。
选项D: D. 弗雷德会去找别的邻居帮忙照料花草。
STORY: Fred is an old man who likes garden work. One morning, he finds a stray kitten in his garden at home. A strong sense of compassion makes him decide to adopt this kitten. However, when he just prepares food for the kitten, he finds that his flowers and plants are about to die. His neighbor happens to come over and asks him: "If you go to the convenience store to buy something for me, I can help you take care of these plants." Fred decides to go to the convenience store.
QUESTION: What does Fred do after he fulfills the neighbor's request?
OPTION-A: Fred feeds the food to the kitten.
OPTION-B: Fred continues to take care of the flowers and plants himself.
OPTION-C: Fred goes to find more stray cats.
OPTION-D: Fred goes to ask other neighbors to help take care of the flowers and plants.

故事: 小男孩李雷计划用节约下来的钱去动物园看企鹅。然而，在去动物园的路上，他看到了一个售卖电动赛车模型的玩具店，店主告诉他，如果他用那些钱来买赛车模型，他还能免费获得一个手电筒。李雷过于兴奋，决定花钱买下这个电动赛车模型。
问题: 李雷买了电动赛车模型后，他会怎么做？
选项A: A. 李雷将去动物园看企鹅。
选项B: B. 李雷将不再去动物园看企鹅。
选项C: C. 李雷将会把电动赛车模型带去动物园。
选项D: D. 李雷将会用手电筒去动物园看企鹅。
STORY: The little boy Li Lei plans to use the saved money to go to the zoo to see penguins. However, on the way to the zoo, he sees a toy store that sells electric racing car models. The shop owner tells him that if he uses that money to buy a racing car model, he also gets a flashlight for free. Li Lei is too excited and decides to spend money to buy this electric racing car model.
QUESTION: After Li Lei buys the electric racing car model, what does he do?
OPTION-A: Li Lei goes to the zoo to see penguins.
OPTION-B: Li Lei no longer goes to the zoo to see penguins.
OPTION-C: Li Lei takes the electric racing car model to the zoo.
OPTION-D: Li Lei uses the flashlight to go to the zoo to see penguins.

故事: 大学生杰克即将面临期末考试，因此，他计划周末留在宿舍里复习进度落后的课程。然而，当他的朋友们邀请他去户外活动时，他同意了朋友们的邀约。
问题: 杰克与朋友们户外活动结束后，他会怎么做？
选项A: A. 杰克回宿舍学习。
选项B: B. 杰克继续和朋友们邀约改天去户外玩耍。
选项C: C. 杰克去图书馆看书。
选项D: D. 杰克开始准备下一次的户外活动。
STORY: College student Jack is about to face the final exam, so he plans to stay in the dormitory to review the courses that are behind schedule over the weekend. However, when his friends invite him to outdoor activities, he agrees to their invitation.
QUESTION: What does Jack do after the outdoor activities with his friends end?
OPTION-A: Jack returns to the dormitory to study.
OPTION-B: Jack continues to make plans with his friends to go outdoors another day.
OPTION-C: Jack goes to the library to read books.
OPTION-D: Jack starts preparing for the next outdoor activity.

故事: 少女艾米正在宿舍里绘画。艾米对画画非常热衷，她一直渴望能完成一幅水彩画。突然，她的朋友丽莎跑来找她，丽莎说：“艾米，我们马上就要去做体育活动了，你一起来吗？”艾米瞪了一眼画板，犹豫了一下，但是最后还是决定把画笔放下，跟丽莎一起去做体育活动。
问题: 艾米做完体育活动后她会去做什么？
选项A: A. 艾米会返回宿舍继续完成她的水彩画。
选项B: B. 艾米会去图书馆看书。
选项C: C. 艾米会去食堂吃饭。
选项D: D. 艾米会去街上购物。
STORY: The young girl Amy is painting in her dormitory. Amy is very passionate about painting, she always desires to complete a watercolor painting. Suddenly, her friend Lisa comes to find her, Lisa says: "Amy, we are about to do sports activities, do you come with us?" Amy glares at the drawing board, hesitates for a moment, but in the end, she decides to put down the paintbrush and go to do sports activities with Lisa.
QUESTION: What does Amy do after she finishes sports activities?
OPTION-A: Amy returns to the dormitory to continue her watercolor painting.
OPTION-B: Amy goes to the library to read books.
OPTION-C: Amy goes to the cafeteria to eat.
OPTION-D: Amy goes shopping on the street.

故事: 年轻的玛丽正在为环保活动准备标语。她正在思考如何让标语更有力量吸引人们的注意。当她准备开始写作时，她的小侄女走过来说，"玛丽阿姨，我想玩游戏，你能跟我一起玩吗?" 玛丽看了眼桌上的标语，然后笑着答应陪小侄女玩游戏。
问题: 玛丽和小侄女玩完游戏后她会去做什么？
选项A: A. 玛丽会回到桌边完成她的环保标语。
选项B: B. 玛丽会去厨房做饭。
选项C: C. 玛丽会去看一部电影放松自己。
选项D: D. 玛丽会开始清理房间。
STORY: Young Mary is preparing slogans for environmental protection activities. She is thinking about how to make the slogans more powerful to attract people's attention. When she is ready to start writing, her little niece comes over and says, "Aunt Mary, I want to play games, can you play with me?" Mary looks at the slogan on the table, then smiles and agrees to play games with her little niece.
QUESTION: What does Mary do after she finishes playing games with her niece?
OPTION-A: Mary goes back to the table to finish her environmental protection slogan.
OPTION-B: Mary goes to the kitchen to cook.
OPTION-C: Mary goes to watch a movie to relax herself.
OPTION-D: Mary starts to clean the room.

故事: 杰森热爱钢琴，并一直渴望拥有自己的钢琴，但一直因资金问题而未能实现。他的女朋友琳知道这个想法后，给他承诺买一架钢琴，但条件是如果一年内能减轻20磅。杰森为了这架钢琴并最终决定开始锻炼以达到目标。
问题: 如果杰森达到了体重目标，他会怎么做？
选项A: A. 他会在家里弹自己的钢琴。
选项B: B. 他会去健身房继续锻炼。
选项C: C. 他会开始学习新的乐器。
选项D: D. 他会去旅游庆祝成功.
STORY: Jason loves the piano and always desires to have his own piano, but he cannot achieve it due to financial problems. His girlfriend, Lin, knows this idea and promises to buy him a piano, but the condition is if he can lose 20 pounds within a year. Jason, for this piano, finally decides to start exercising to reach the goal.
QUESTION: What does Jason do if he reaches the weight goal?
OPTION-A: He plays his own piano at home.
OPTION-B: He goes to the gym to continue exercising.
OPTION-C: He starts to learn a new instrument.
OPTION-D: He goes on a trip to celebrate success.

故事: 艾玛希望她的孩子们能结交更多的朋友，并帮助他们提高社交技巧。为此，她打算将聚会定在周末，让孩子们的朋友们都能来。但艾玛的丈夫建议，如果艾玛能协助他完成他的项目报告，他会帮助艾玛筹备这个聚会。艾玛选择了帮助她的丈夫。
问题: 艾玛帮助她的丈夫完成了他的项目报告后，她将会怎么做？
选项A: A. 艾玛将会筹备她孩子们的聚会。
选项B: B. 艾玛将会开始一项新的项目。
选项C: C. 艾玛将会邀请她的丈夫一起出去度假。
选项D: D. 艾玛将会为自己的丈夫准备一次惊喜派对。
STORY: Emma hopes her children make more friends and helps them improve their social skills. For this, she plans to hold a party on the weekend, so all the friends of her children come. But Emma's husband suggests that if Emma helps him complete his project report, he helps Emma prepare this party. Emma chooses to help her husband.
QUESTION: After Emma helps her husband complete his project report, what does she do?
OPTION-A: Emma prepares a party for her children.
OPTION-B: Emma starts a new project.
OPTION-C: Emma invites her husband to go on vacation together.
OPTION-D: Emma prepares a surprise party for her husband.

故事: 大学生约瑟夫和他的朋友约定在假期去欧洲旅行。他们都很期待这次的旅行。然而，约瑟夫需要通过即将到来的期末考试，否则需要花费假期时间准备补考。在复习和旅行之间，约瑟夫选择了留在图书馆复习。
问题: 考试未通过的约瑟夫会做什么？
选项A: A. 约瑟夫会和他的朋友们一起去欧洲旅行。
选项B: B. 约瑟夫会举办一场派对以放松心情。
选项C: C. 约瑟夫会去学校的游泳池游泳。
选项D: D. 约瑟夫不会和他的朋友们一起去欧洲旅行。
STORY: College student Joseph and his friends make a promise to travel to Europe during the holiday. They all look forward to this trip. However, Joseph needs to pass the upcoming final exam, otherwise, he needs to spend holiday time preparing for the make-up exam. Between reviewing and traveling, Joseph chooses to stay in the library for review.
QUESTION: What does Joseph do if he does not pass the exam?
OPTION-A: Joseph goes on a trip to Europe with his friends.
OPTION-B: Joseph throws a party to relax.
OPTION-C: Joseph goes to the school swimming pool for a swim.
OPTION-D: Joseph does not go on a trip to Europe with his friends.

故事: 约瑟夫一直想去看大峡谷，但苦于较高的成本一直没能实现。但他的公司收到了一个大的项目，需要他去纽约出差进行项目维护。他的老板告诉他，如果他决定接受这个项目，公司将给他额外的奖金。于是约瑟夫决定去纽约。
问题: 约瑟夫完成纽约的项目任务后,他会怎么做？
选项A: A. 约瑟夫会用奖金去大峡谷旅游。
选项B: B. 约瑟夫会用奖金购买一辆新车。
选项C: C. 约瑟夫会将奖金存入银行。
选项D: D. 约瑟夫会用奖金来装修他的房子。
STORY: Joseph always wants to visit the Grand Canyon, but the high cost prevents him from doing so. However, his company receives a big project that requires him to go to New York for business trips to maintain the project. His boss tells him that if he decides to accept this project, the company gives him an extra bonus. So Joseph decides to go to New York.
QUESTION: What does Joseph do after he completes the project task in New York?
OPTION-A: Joseph uses the bonus to travel to the Grand Canyon.
OPTION-B: Joseph uses the bonus to buy a new car.
OPTION-C: Joseph puts the bonus into the bank.
OPTION-D: Joseph uses the bonus to renovate his house.

故事: 艾玛是一个软件开发团队的负责人，她一直梦想引进新的技术来提升团队的效率。然而，她的团队最近接到了一个新的大项目，需要尽快完成。客户愿意支付额外的费用以确保项目优先完成。因此，艾玛决定暂时放弃引进新技术的计划，全力以赴完成这个大项目。
问题: 艾玛完成这个大项目后,她会怎么做？
选项A: A. 艾玛会用这些额外的费用为团队引进新技术。
选项B: B. 艾玛会用这些额外的费用请团队成员去度假。
选项C: C. 艾玛会用这些额外的费用进行个人投资。
选项D: D. 艾玛会将这些额外的费用捐赠给慈善机构。
STORY: Emma is a leader of a software development team, she always dreams of introducing new technology to improve team efficiency. However, her team recently receives a new big project, which needs to be completed as soon as possible. The client is willing to pay extra fees to ensure the project is prioritized. Therefore, Emma decides to temporarily give up the plan to introduce new technology and devotes herself to completing this big project.
QUESTION: What does Emma do after she completes this big project?
OPTION-A: Emma uses these extra fees to introduce new technology for the team.
OPTION-B: Emma uses these extra fees to take the team members on vacation.
OPTION-C: Emma uses these extra fees for personal investment.
OPTION-D: Emma donates these extra fees to a charity organization.

故事: 大卫是一个善良且热心的邻居，他经常帮助邻里出入帮忙的老人。某天，他正在准备组织一个小型BBQ派对，邀请了很多朋友。然而，老人们却告诉他，他们需要他帮忙修理社区园区的公共设施。大卫决定取消派对，去帮助他们修理设施。
问题: 大卫修理完设施后，他会做什么？
选项A: A. 大卫将重新组织BBQ派对。
选项B: B. 大卫将离开社区。
选项C: C. 大卫将继续修理其他设施。
选项D: D. 大卫将去找老人们聊天。
STORY: David is a kind and enthusiastic neighbor, he often helps the elderly in the neighborhood. One day, he is preparing to organize a small BBQ party and invites many friends. However, the elderly tell him that they need his help to repair the public facilities in the community park. David decides to cancel the party and goes to help them repair the facilities.
QUESTION: What does David do after he finishes repairing the facilities?
OPTION-A: David reorganizes the BBQ party.
OPTION-B: David leaves the community.
OPTION-C: David continues to repair other facilities.
OPTION-D: David goes to chat with the elderly.

故事: 丽莎是位程序员，一天，她在网上发现了一款很赞的键盘，非常想要购买。然而公司的年度晚会上，丽莎被选为最佳员工，并得到了一份奖励，这是一套她梦寐以求的顶级游戏外设。于是丽莎决定将零花钱用于购买更多的游戏。
问题: 丽莎购买游戏后会怎么做？
选项A: A. 丽莎将不再购买那款键盘。
选项B: B. 丽莎将购买更多的游戏外设。
选项C: C. 丽莎将给同事们展示她的游戏。
选项D: D. 丽莎将放弃游戏，专注于工作。

However, at the company's annual party, Lisa was voted best employee and was given a reward, a set of top-of-the-line gaming peripherals that she had always dreamed of. OPTION-D: Lisa gives up the game and focuses on work.

故事: 丽丽一直在存钱，希望和她的男朋友一起去巴厘岛度假。然而，丽丽的男朋友在他的生日动情地告诉她，他一直梦想拥有一款名牌手表。听到男朋友的愿望，丽丽决定用她的储蓄来为他购买那款手表。
问题: 丽丽购买手表给她的男朋友后，她会怎么做？
选项A: A. 丽丽会为了纪念这一刻拍很多照片
选项B: B. 丽丽将和男朋友去巴厘岛度假。
选项C: C. 丽丽将不会去巴厘岛度假。
选项D: D. 丽丽将存钱购买另一款手表。
STORY: Lili always saves money, hoping to go on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend. However, Lili's boyfriend tells her emotionally on his birthday that he always dreams of owning a brand-name watch. Hearing her boyfriend's wish, Lili decides to use her savings to buy him that watch.
QUESTION: What does Lili do after she buys the watch for her boyfriend?
OPTION-A: Lili takes many photos to commemorate this moment.
OPTION-B: Lili goes on vacation to Bali with her boyfriend.
OPTION-C: Lili does not go on vacation to Bali.
OPTION-D: Lili saves money to buy another watch.

故事: 萨拉是一名设计师，她一直希望能为公司的新项目设计一款独特的LOGO。然而她的队友最近因病请假，负责制作宣传片的任务落到了她身上，她决定全力完成宣传片的制作。
问题: 萨拉完成宣传片的制作后会做什么？
选项A: A. 萨拉将继续完成项目LOGO的制作。
选项B: B. 萨拉会继续制作更多的宣传片。
选项C: C. 萨拉将休息一段时间然后再进行新的任务。
选项D: D. 萨拉会辞去设计师的职务。
STORY: Sara is a designer, she always hopes to design a unique LOGO for the company's new project. However, her teammate is on sick leave recently, the task of making the promotional video falls on her, she decides to fully complete the production of the promotional video.
